## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f7a64d316c75e0e53a3a525a50d591725648d0064b5f1d5c622b3c94ef5aaf30)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@google-research/retvecjs' @ 100.999.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
